tracks.text: A rope curls in a circle. Text, BRADIO
Lead singer Shingyoji, wearing a tan suit and an afro, sings in front of a backdrop of crumbled $1 and $10 bills. A man in a suit and rabbit head plays a trumpet.
The guitarist, bassist, and drummer play. The rabbit headed trombonist is copy pasted dozens of times in the background.
Text appears behind them. Bradio - Flyers.
As Shingyoji sings, light bulbs explode behind him. He holds 4 billiards balls and tosses them over his shoulder.
The balls land over the 4 band members, and their clothes change to match the color of the balls.
They perform in front of a backdrop depicting dice falling in slow motion.
The dice rolls along a table with numbers.
The band plays on a green field. Billiards ball rolls past. Some are human sized, some are soccer ball sized.
Shingyoji kicks one.
The band members are copy pasted on top of each other dozens of times. All copies groove together to the music.
Fireworks explode in the sky behind them.
Fireworks sparkle all around them. The rabbit headed trombonist plays.
Shingyoji lines up a pool stick in front of a white ball. The band members watch.
The band looks around.
Shingyoji's mouth talks on the white ball while he hits it.
Cards fall behind the band.
Cards land face down on a table.
The cards face us. Shingyoji sings on the Ace of Spades. King is Guitarist Ohyama. Queen is drummer Tanabe. Jack is bassist Sakai.
Shingyoji sits at a table holding 5 cards in his hand. The band members stare over his shoulder. Lights glitter in the background.
The band turns to us, saying "Flying". Quarters and pennies bounce and sparkle. Fireworks explode.
Stacks of poker chips rise and fall.
Fireworks explode over a snowy mountain. Ohyama rises behind it, playing guitar.
As he plays, copies of him slide sideways
Copies of Sakai play the bass in a line, looking away from us.
Copies of Tanabe shakes their heads back and forth as they play the drums.
The band members dance in sync, moving their arms die to side and posing in time with the music.
Pictures of the members heads bounce around the shoulders of the dancing bodies.
Dozens of copies of each member gather in a crowd, dancing.
Shingyoji sings in front of fireworks.
Sakai plays in front of rabbit trombonist copies.
We pull back, revealing more rabbit copies, and the rest of the band. They perform in front of fireworks and behind the text, Bradio Flyers
Cut to black
Text, Hero Music Entertainment
